Initials: Pink M on blue ground, infilled with blue vines, red ivy leaves and two animal heads in red, white tracery on initial and ground
Costume: L'Amans is tonsured and Dangier wears a hooded garment

Initials: Historiated initial: pinkish U on blue and pink ground, white tracery, orange stars on the pink ground
